resources.string: Starvation is a severe deficiency in caloric energy intake, below the level needed to maintain an organisms life.
Emaciation is defined as extreme weight loss and unnatural thinness due to a loss of subcutaneous fat (the fatty, or adipose tissue beneath the skin) and muscle throughout the body.
An underweight person is a person whose body weight is considered too low to be healthy.
Being overweight or fat is having more body fat than is optimally healthy. Being overweight is especially common where food supplies are plentiful and lifestyles are sedentary.
Is severe obesity Obesity is a medical condition in which excess body fat has accumulated to an extent that it may have a negative effect on health.
Is morbid obesity Obesity is a medical condition in which excess body fat has accumulated to an extent that it may have a negative effect on health.
Is super obesity Obesity is a medical condition in which excess body fat has accumulated to an extent that it may have a negative effect on health.

Welcome in my app!

 You can change between european and american units in menu in the right top corner. Current unit will be displayed near the text box.

 If you choose european units you have to input weight between 30 and 400 kg, height between 100 and 250 cm.

 In american units case you have to input weight between 66 and 880 lb, height between 40 and 98 in.

 You can check history of the last ten measurements clicking on the history in menu (icon with clock).

 You can also delete history of measurements choosing option Clear history in the menu. After calculating bmi for valid values, you can get more information about your current bmi state just clicking on the text field with result.
